alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Gallatin, south central Posey, southwestern Henderson, Union and northeastern Webster Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Breckinridge Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Corydon around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sebree and Robards. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 132 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southern Illinois...southwestern Indiana...and northwestern Kentucky.
